name: Mimic
evidence:
Spirit Box 
Fingerprints 
Freezing Temperatures 
(Ghost Orbs)
trait:
The Mimic will **always** have Ghost Orbs as a fake evidence. 
If you ever get 4 pieces of evidence (or 3 on nightmare), you are dealing with a Mimic 
 
Note: This only goes for Spirit Box, Fingerprints, Freezing Temperatures, and Ghost Orbs. If you have 4 evidence, but not these, then we suggest double checking the evidence you had, just to be sure you saw them.

**Can Hunt at any Sanity, depends on what Ghost it mimics!**
ability:
The Mimic can do **any ability** or **trait** of **any ghost** 
Watch out!
